N = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    ans += max(h[i] - ans, 0)

print(ans)

import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    ans += h[i] - 1
print(ans)

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > cnt:
        cnt = h[i]

print(cnt)
